about.title: About SeedCo
about.description: SeedCo is committed to producing high-quality agricultural seeds through rigorous research, professional cultivation, and sustainable innovation. For years, our company has partnered with farmers across Indonesia to improve yields, resist pests, and ensure long-term food security.
about.visionText: To become the leading seed provider in Southeast Asia, helping farmers achieve sustainable, efficient, and productive harvests.
missionList: Provide high-yield and disease-resistant seed varieties.
Support farming communities with education and training.
Promote sustainable farming for future generations.

timeline.text: SeedCo was founded with a mission to elevate agricultural standards in Indonesia.
Established our R&D division focusing on hybrid seed innovation.
Expanded distribution across 18 provinces, supporting thousands of farmers.
Introduced pest-resistant seed series with up to 30% higher efficiency.

about.rndText: Our R&D team develops high-performance seeds tested across various climates and soils. With continuous improvements, we deliver superior growth, resilience, and yield consistency.

hero.title: Research & Development
hero.subtitle: We develop superior seed varieties by combining modern science with real-world trials.

workflow.title: Germplasm Collection
workflow.desc: Collecting superior parent material from trusted sources.

workflow.title: Hybridization
workflow.desc: Crossing selected lines to combine the best traits.

workflow.title: Quality Assurance
workflow.desc: Seed testing, certification and scaling production.

experts.name: Dr. Ani Saputra
experts.bio: Expert in plant breeding and molecular genetics.

experts.name: Ir. Budi Santoso
experts.bio: Leads multi-site field trials and agronomy protocols.

experts.name: Dr. Siti Rahma
experts.bio: Quality control and seed certification specialist.

rnd.ctaText: Interested in trials, licensing, or collaboration? Reach out to our R&D team.
